website_summaries.verdict: The budget-minded Synology Disk Station DS214se is an excellent choice for home with casual backup, media-streaming, and data-sharing needs.
pros: The Synology Disk Station DS214se has a robust operating system and a vast amount of applications to offer anything you'd need
The server is also fast, and it's very affordable
cons: The server doesn't have enough power to handle multiple heavy tasks at the same time, and it doesn't support USB 3.0
Servicing the internal drive requires opening the its chassis

customer_reviews.title: Good product. I was a bit disappointed with the ...
customer_reviews.text: Good product. I was a bit disappointed with the fact that I can't stream every single video I have from my chromecast because this model doesn't handle transcoding. But overall it's been working almost 24x7 and no problems whatsoever till now. I would recommend it because it's affordable and very easy to install and use with the basic functions. I've also connected my IP camera to it and it notifies by email me when movement is detected, as some kind of alarm. The DSM web interface is very intuitive also and you can configure many things from there.
customer_reviews.author: Leonardo

customer_reviews.title: Love the hardware.  Needed a different sync tool for remote syncing.
customer_reviews.text: I have two of these...one at home and one at the office. If you want redundant storage for your small business...this product works great. I tried one's from Buffalo and others without a lot of success. From a hardware perspective, Synology is very robust. If you are going to be sync'ing a lot of data over the internet, I wouldn't recommend their sync tools though. I need to sync about 2TB, and the tools they have just aren't sophisticated enough for me. Problems with error checking, bandwidth control, pausing sync, etc. I use GoodSync to sync...and, that works amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Andy W

customer_reviews.title: Still looking
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for about 6 months now and was using it to back up my cell phone, tablet's but my phone updated and now it can not sync my sd card only internal storage now There doesn't seem to be a lot of online support when looking to fix some thing or getting a program like the mail server to work It's SLOW I'm not sure what the processing power of it is but it takes forever to load images that have been saved just to see a preview it will not play a lot of formats back via video so you'll have to download them to watch them
customer_reviews.author: kenkendsm

customer_reviews.title: Not bad, but a little slow
customer_reviews.text: I think you get a good NAS for your money. It does sacrifice some on the processor power, which I didn't think would be too much of an issue. It is only ever noticed when downloading a lot of files, particularly over the LAN because it takes awhile for it to catch up on things I think are related to thumbnails or indexing. I uploaded something like 50gb of photos and this really took days to finish processing. During that time it was difficult to use. Otherwise, it is an excellent solution and I may get another from the same brand.
customer_reviews.author: Cracgor

customer_reviews.title: You can install just one or two drives the device supports all RAID types which is extremely easy to setup though the custom OS
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the device without hard drives, the device doesn't support hot swappable drives, but it just takes two screws to open, slide the drive in and two screws to secure. You can install just one or two drives the device supports all RAID types which is extremely easy to setup though the custom OS via the browser. I was up and running in about 15 minutes. It's easy to setup different accounts and it's easy to share photo's videos and sync with other cloud based services. Even after uploading a lot of data to the box was still quiet and fans were basically noiseless. This is a superb little device, i highly recommend for a small home server.
customer_reviews.author: Bual

customer_reviews.title: Synology Diskstation works well, lacks documentation.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this unit together with a 1 Tbyte WD Red drive. Installation of the drive in the Diskstation, software installation and uploading of files to the network drive went smoothly on my desktop running Windows 7. However, access to the uploaded files on the network using other household PCs was problematic and there is no instruction manual. Help with setup of the network configuration and troubleshooting is minimal. For that reason I would not recommend it to anyone who is not thoroughly savvy in network software and the terminology thereof.
customer_reviews.author: Coolmaker

customer_reviews.title: Great NAS Server
customer_reviews.text: So far this NAS ROCKS! I set it up with 2 1TB drives and shortly decided i needed bigger drives so i put 2 2TB drives in. The amount of features it has is amazing. I have just started scratching the surface. The setup wizard makes setting it up so easy. I have no set up external access yet but internal access is a breeze. The main purpose i got this for is to share photos, docs, videos on our local network without having to setup windows shares. This is so much easier then setting up homegroups etc. So far i have no had any problems and am very happy with this unit.
customer_reviews.author: Willie

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful device, wonderful company and support!
customer_reviews.text: I'm writing this review on the 1 year anniversary of purchasing this device and I absolutely love it. It does way more than I was expecting and I have to say that I think Synology programmers are very good. The other thing I'm impressed with is their attention to security and their updates. When a new CVE (security vulnerability) comes up I will see an update from Synology within a few weeks. They are dedicated to their products and that should I ever need a larger device I would ONLY buy Synology. I use this device as my storage (of course), mail server, VPN server, media server and it has never let me down.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended after wasting time with FREENAS & NAS4FREE
customer_reviews.text: Tried several times with FREENAS & NAS4FREE to setup a NAS, neither really worked properly with issues formatting/recognizing known good HDs and other cryptic errors. Purchased the Synology based on reviews, awesome device, very nice OS on the device, installed 2x Western Digital RED drives. This was for a customer, still running strong - ZERO issues since initial setup. It did take some time for it to setup the HDs, but device is working great, quiet, and well, it just works. Will definitely purchase again and recommend these to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Service Tech

customer_reviews.title: Both work great. I have Windows
customer_reviews.text: Bought it with a 3TB WD Red drive.. Both work great. I have Windows, Mac, and Linux systems on my network and have no problems accessing it with any of them,
customer_reviews.author: Raymond Pfaff

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Home NAS
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for a home NAS solution. Added WD Red 3TB drives to mine and use it to back up two Mac laptops using time machine and one PC as well as central repository for movies, music and files. Great thing about Sinology are the app's for both the NAS and iOS devices. As an example using the iOS DS app you can stream or download your movies to your iPad. Strongly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Bill H

customer_reviews.title: So glad I finally got this NAS
customer_reviews.text: I was on the fence for a long time about whether I should get a NAS or just some more hard drives. I'm glad I finally jumped. So far I've set it up as a Plex media server, a Time Machine backup for my wife's laptop, and storage for a lot of important files, which also get backed up to Amazon AWS cloud storage through the NAS. I look forward to finding even more uses for the Synology NAS.
customer_reviews.author: Domenico Bettinelli

customer_reviews.title: AN I GOTA SAY I LOVE IT, I WISH I HAD BOUGHT ONE YEARS ...
customer_reviews.text: I BOUGHT THIS TO TRY IT N SE HOW WELL IT WORKD ,AN I GOTA SAY I LOVE IT ,I WISH I HAD BOUGHT ONE YEARS AGO.. IT WORKS GREAT.. I HAVE MY WHOLE PC BAKD UP ON IT ,PLUS ALL MY PICS THAT CANT BE REPLACED, AN ALL MY MOVIES ,MUSIC,MODS FOR MY SIMULATOR GAMES AN ALL.. I LOVE THS THNG.. AN I CAN LOG INTO IT FROM ANY WHERE TO GET A PIC FOR A FAMILY MEMBER OR MOD FOR A FRIND.OR WATCH A MOVIE.LOL. THY R GREAT..
customer_reviews.author: BIGCHEW151

customer_reviews.title: I think it's fantastic
customer_reviews.text: This is my first NAS. I'm very happy with it. The software works quite well, and you can download additional apps to add functionality as well. System is not loud at all, doesn't get very hot, and looks pretty slick as well. The plastic case seems kinda cheap/flimsy, but you only need to take it off to install the hard drives and it sits in the corner somewhere so it won't get knocked around. I really like the hibernation feature so it doesn't run on full power all the time. Highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: Rekman707

customer_reviews.title: Very fast; I installed the Western Digital Red NAS ...
customer_reviews.text: Very fast; I installed the Western Digital Red NAS Hard Drive WD20EFRX 2TB IntelliPower 64MB Cache SATA 6.0Gb/s 3.5" Internal Hard Drives. Avoid the WD green drives as I had two fail in less than fail quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Greg V

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I like it much better than the competing products. Exactly what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: W. Bradley

customer_reviews.title: great disk station and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Great disk station and easy to customize, you can pick your own hard drive. We installed some NAS ones and had no issue so far, got the product quite some time ago to see if all works. It could be ab it faster at times, but I think for the reason we bought it (storage for photos, music, etc) not a problem at all.
customer_reviews.author: Jesena

customer_reviews.title: I Highly Recommend
customer_reviews.text: I decided to retire and down size my old equipment. The Synology unit fit my needs and my wallet! Installed in minutes and has been up, without a problem ever since. Synology software guides you through setup and I would say that even a novice could handle this install.
customer_reviews.author: ozzy6900

customer_reviews.title: I have been using this enclosure with two 4 TB ...
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this enclosure with two 4 TB hard drives. It has built in software to use it as a media server. I use it to stream movies from the hard drives to my two Roku 3 boxes. There are many extra software packages that can be downloaded for various uses. I also use it as part of a backup system for my Mac laptop.
customer_reviews.author: Padre

customer_reviews.title: Very nice NAS
customer_reviews.text: Bought this 2 June 2014. Popped in 2 WD 1TBs. Set up was fairly easy - up and running as mirror RAID array in less than 2 hrs. Been going strong since. Firmware updates are simple, Online help is pretty good. It goes to sleep when not needed and wakes very quickly whenever a networked device is booted.
customer_reviews.author: PDXGeologist

customer_reviews.title: This is NOT your Father's NAS
customer_reviews.text: Really like it so far, but it has tons of stuff to setup if you want to experiment with all its capabilities. On boot up in Win7 the mapped drives that point to the NAS do not reconnect - I always have to provide my password to get them to reconnect. Also copying files to the NAS is much slower than I expected - maybe I am missing something that can improve the performance.
customer_reviews.author: William Branch

customer_reviews.title: Was slightly disappointed it does not support Plex directly as a media ...
customer_reviews.text: Unit arrived on time. Was slightly disappointed it does not support Plex directly as a media server but its a small ditracotr and not enough to drop from the 5. Definitly a good item to have on your network for storage of music, pictures and other media.
customer_reviews.author: merc669

customer_reviews.title: great NAS device
customer_reviews.text: The DS214SE is easy to setup, fast, quiet.... The OS is great (although it can't use all of the apps at the Synology marketplace) I was surprised to find WD GREEN drives installed instead of the WD RED drives that are used when advertising this device when you purchase it with included storage. If it came with the WD RED drives it implies it does, it would get 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: IT Pro

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for my needs
customer_reviews.text: Works exactly as advertised. Easy to set up and place on our home network which has about 8 devices on it. Storing files on it is extremely easy by mapping the drive to the computer. I have also set up 2 separate attached USB drives with automatic backup from the Synology device to the USB drives for triple backup redundancy. I am not using more sophisticated features as I only wanted this for network storage and managing backups.
customer_reviews.author: Alan G Mowbray

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up and use
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up and use! Great value. I did the research, Synology was always at, or near, the top in the reviews of NAS/RAIDs. This model, is not the most feature rich of their product line, but is does everything that I require.
customer_reviews.author: Just Bob

customer_reviews.title: very slow NAS, don't buy it.
customer_reviews.text: it runs very slow. cpu is almost always between 90-100% and the 256 MB of RAM that it comes with is very small. overall I don't like this NAS device. don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Camrez

customer_reviews.title: Purchased this at my friend's advice to replace a server ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this at my friend's advice to replace a server that crashed. Set up was simple, it is a pleasure to use, and is set up to back up to a separate gmail as well. It is very small and looks sleek and modern.
customer_reviews.author: Alisa

customer_reviews.title: Good, solid operator
customer_reviews.text: This is a very capable box (I have the larger 214 version) and the only thing I miss is the ability to hot-swap...or at least swap out the drives without taking the box apart. My only complaint at all. It's a nice box.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Fahrlander

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: I have a hard time setting up. Still trying to sync folder for PC to Diskstation
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed
customer_reviews.text: Been using this for 6 months and it works great. It is a little slower than having files on a PC, but having RAID make me feel secure that I won't loose my files.
customer_reviews.author: TPM

customer_reviews.title: and this is by far the best NAS solution for home
customer_reviews.text: I have been an IT engineer for over 20 years, and this is by far the best NAS solution for home. I purchased 2 of them.
customer_reviews.author: David U.

customer_reviews.title: Always a great piece of hardware.
customer_reviews.text: Synology NAS solutions always work great. The 214se is great for general storage. But, if you need media streaming you should get the 214 or 214play.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey

customer_reviews.title: Budget friendly amazing NAS !!!
customer_reviews.text: Great NAS for beginners!! I needed a NAS to share common files with my wife. Its fast and easy to configure, compact and really quiet. Can do a lot more of what i'm using it for. I'm slowly trying different functions, ( back ups, Clouds functions... ). Again, great NAS :)
customer_reviews.author: Jean-Marc

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use, though you do need some technical know-how. Exactly what I needed for all my media. Interface is easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: IR

customer_reviews.title: I'll update as I go.
customer_reviews.text: I'll update as I go. Maybe I should have went with a WD. It took 3.5 hrs to transfer 230gb. Unit ran well...for awhile. I came home to a blue flashing power light after 5 hours of run time. This seems to have happened to others and a new unit was the solution. Email sent to Synology :/ UPDATE-new WD RED 3TB is what failed. Unit works well
customer_reviews.author: YETIAS3

customer_reviews.title: Excelent
customer_reviews.text: Just beautiful, have tons of applications for developer, storage, mysl tomcat... almost an small server highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: Juan S.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent easy to setup raid. This is much better than the Buffalo Raid it replaced.
customer_reviews.text: Worked right out of the box. The web interface is good and it works well with my Linux (Ubuntu 14.02 LTS) system.
customer_reviews.author: Cruizer Ed

customer_reviews.title: My 6 year old Synology NAS died in a lightning ...
customer_reviews.text: My 6 year old Synology NAS died in a lightning storm. Pulled the old drives and dropped them in here and the new setup was seamless and I did not lose any data.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonLifer

customer_reviews.title: Reasonably easy to set up with either one or two raw ...
customer_reviews.text: Reasonably easy to set up with either one or two raw drives. System automatically sets two drives to Raid 1. It also sends monthly emails about the status of the system.
customer_reviews.author: Stretch178

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I have mine set up with 2 WD red 4TB no issues
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great entry level NAS.
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful interface. Not super fast, but great for entry level.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Kane

customer_reviews.title: Replaced my bulky Linux server
customer_reviews.text: This box is amazing. It does all I needed and more. I was able to get rid of a Linux server that ran various standard functions, saving space, power, and maintenance time.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and setup
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and setup. Works great for backups and online to see files. I don't use it for music or video, so I can't comment on that use.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Jones

customer_reviews.title: This thing is pretty sweet. VERY easy to install the HDD
customer_reviews.text: This thing is pretty sweet. VERY easy to install the HDD. Kinda easy to install all software and get it up and running. Solid replacement for using Dropbox or other cloud based services. And no yearly cost.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan D Rulli

customer_reviews.title: Works great.......
customer_reviews.text: Excellent enclosure nice and sleek. Fan is quiet with good airflow for keeping the hard drives cool and up to par.
customer_reviews.author: Rawhide

customer_reviews.title: This NAS box is really awesome! I put some movies that I had digital ...
customer_reviews.text: This NAS box is really awesome! I put some movies that I had digital and downloaded the video app on it and it pulled all the metadata from imdb so I have movie poster and synapse.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: very easy to set up and use
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for my husband and he absolutely loves it! Lots of storage, very easy to set up and use!
customer_reviews.author: Lovecocoandbean

customer_reviews.title: This NAS device is fast!
customer_reviews.text: This purchase has been a very successful. I have two 3TB HDs for sharing media with the family in the house. This is now my primary work horse NAS. It is fast! It copies data over the network at almost 90MB/s. I like the local website for managing the device, it is somewhat easy to use, power management is also a nice feature, it wake up fully in less than 5 sec. I have not experienced any problems with this Diskstation. It easily one of my favorite purchases that I am proud of :)
customer_reviews.author: Mortal Kombat

customer_reviews.title: ... network to stream movies and music and this was perfect fit.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to have home network to stream movies and music and this was perfect fit.
customer_reviews.author: seong hyeok kim

customer_reviews.title: it's a good product.
customer_reviews.text: DLNA server don't work correctly with my Panasonic Viera TV set (2014). Managed to find a workaround by installing MiniDLNA. Synology: please fix it ! Beside, it's a good product.
customer_reviews.author: Vincent BARAT

customer_reviews.title: Great NAS
customer_reviews.text: Easy setup process. Works great and quiet. Serves as my iTunes and Plex server.
customer_reviews.author: A. Wabeke

customer_reviews.title: Somehow I can't back up to it but as a ...
customer_reviews.text: Somehow I can't back up to it but as a print server, it works for my wired printer which what I needed it for.
customer_reviews.author: doogdoog

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended for new comers!
customer_reviews.text: For an entry level NAS device, the set up was straight forward and the features are helpful. If you are a first time buyer of any sort of NAS or beginning to learn about home networks, this is a great first step.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The best GUI ever. Reliable and easy to use, yet powerful.
customer_reviews.author: Ricardo Funes

customer_reviews.title: The best NAS ever
customer_reviews.text: The best NAS ever. Only problem is that sometimes it turns on from hibernation when not in use. Maybe an update would fix the problem.
customer_reviews.author: Dr310

customer_reviews.title: Bought to replace an aging Windows Home Server and it's ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought to replace an aging Windows Home Server and it's a champ. Setup is quick and painless. I was a bit worried about the lower hardware specs from last years model would effect performance but I haven't had any issue with it yet.
customer_reviews.author: buddhalite

customer_reviews.title: Setup remarkably easy.
customer_reviews.text: I installed two WD Red 3TB drives in this, and it is working perfectly. Setup remarkably easy.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas Detling

customer_reviews.title: Great unit. Absolutely love it
customer_reviews.text: Great unit. Absolutely love it. Has a bit of a learning curve. Good customer support. Will be buying higher end model for office. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jason S Chvat

customer_reviews.title: Good hardware & software
customer_reviews.text: Setup was intuitive and easy. Petty much plug and play. The management software is powerful, but yet easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Rod G. Mcclaskey

customer_reviews.title: Simple to install and configure
customer_reviews.text: Simple to install and configure. It does most of the work and has a lot of features such as iTunes and others... great acquisition!
customer_reviews.author: Renato Paz

customer_reviews.title: A great NAS for the price
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to have a second NAS for comparison (my first is a LenovoEMC IX2-DL). It performs about as well as the IX2: slightly faster CIFS, but slightly slower iSCSI. I like the UI a little bit better than the IX2, but some things are not as intuitive. For instance, setting up a LUN requires creating the LUN, and then configuring the target on a second screen. And getting CIFS sharing setup was not very clear either. But I have everything going. Synology's DDNS works very well, and with my ports properly forwarded, I can use that DDNS to access other devices on my network.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Howell

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy
customer_reviews.text: We swapped out our old server and are using this Synology product. So far very happy with this. Works well and it is so small and doesn't take up space in our small office!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great software! I put in 2 3tb NAS drives, and this thing just works great. Lots of apps and very clean interface. I love the email reminders it sends me when there are updates, I don't have to manually check.
customer_reviews.author: geoldr

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this for about a month and am very happy with it. I purchased this for sharing files between my Mac and PC, and was happy to discover it could be used for a variety of other purposes as well (e.g., public web server, cloud storage, media server, etc.). It could not be simpler to set up and configure.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: works Great, has an awesome set of apps you can install like svn and git servers. database server. etc. really pleased with it
customer_reviews.author: Odin

customer_reviews.title: Easy to setup and works
customer_reviews.text: Has worked well and the apps provided have really added value I did not expect. Easy to setup and works great
customer_reviews.author: Gary R Merrifield

customer_reviews.title: Synology makes great software, the support is not great when there ...
customer_reviews.text: Synology makes great software, the support is not great when there is any issue, luckily I have not experienced many issues.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Forsthoff

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: The Synology OS is excellent - intuitive to use and configure, and comes with many, many options, including advanced security options that experienced admins may utilize. For example, 2 factor authentication. The NAS is feature-rich, but in addition there are plenty of 'addon' packages, many free, to make the NAS into more of a server. Packages range from Asterisk to Wordpress.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: cloud sync perfected
customer_reviews.text: Solid drive to sync content to the cloud, like google drive. The is is advanced and simple enough to figure out. I'm very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: getting the hang of it
customer_reviews.text: A little more complex than I was expecting. But I'm getting the hang of it.
customer_reviews.author: mark g.

customer_reviews.title: Great product.  Works great.
customer_reviews.text: Product worked as advertised. Great transaction. Got it on time.
customer_reviews.author: Robert N.

customer_reviews.title: Working great
customer_reviews.text: Synology NAS has been working great since I installed it. Setup and configuration was easy. I would definitely buy another if I needed it.
customer_reviews.author: ebrake

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up and administer. I loved my first one so much I added another to my system
customer_reviews.author: Rob Olian

customer_reviews.title: but so far so good.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for work. Still testing, but so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Davin Gallego

customer_reviews.title: enough features for home use, easy, cheap
customer_reviews.text: This is my first time implementing a NAS at home and I'm happy so far. The browser-based DSM operating system is really awesome. It's functioning as a time-machine backup for my mac and in the future I'll run more stuff on it.
customer_reviews.author: ElectronicH

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: If you have some extra money buy other Synology like DS214 or another with better CPU
customer_reviews.author: Giulio

customer_reviews.title: Economical NAS
customer_reviews.text: As usual Synology stands for NAS. Good Economical NAS for SOHO
customer_reviews.author: Abi

customer_reviews.title: Device stopped working after 9 months and bad customer support
customer_reviews.text: The device stopped reading the hard drives after 9 months. I was told it was hard drive failure. After purchasing another new supported hard drive the device still did not work. Customer service was a pain to deal with and now I am footing the bill to return a junk device. I spent the extra money for the easy of use on this device and it was a big disappointment. I would not recommend purchasing this device
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I only have it for a month but at least it does what it need.
customer_reviews.text: Still one more feature that is needed and that can be done if I had a linux box is: set quota for folder so that the backup folder can had limited in size. Currently everyone say need to workaround it by add extra users for ech of the backup client with disk quota for the backup like timemachine and or Norton backup agent. Hope Synology can add this feature in future release.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Ho

customer_reviews.title: I knew this NAS would also have some other nice features I could learn to use and benefit from
customer_reviews.text: I had already had a 2T external hard drive and I just wanted to setup a convenient home network. I knew this NAS would also have some other nice features I could learn to use and benefit from. Problem is it is unusable until you install Synology's software and... the only way to do that is by formatting and deleting all data on my existing drive. Ridiculous! Maybe this product does what it says, but I couldn't get that far.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Jeffers

customer_reviews.title: i am kind of confused about the whole process. ...
customer_reviews.text: i am kind of confused about the whole process . there seems to be many apps doing the same thing i am having a hard time differentiating which one i should use. + it has been weeks now and it is still copying stuff.... i am not sure how to tell when it will finally finish copying everything?
customer_reviews.author: Tomasz S. Bielecki

customer_reviews.title: NOT EASY SETUP
customer_reviews.text: This thing specifically advertises itself as easy to set up. The instructions tell you to use\\SharePoint\Share1 as a path to map a network drive for the device in windows. This doesn't work though all the indicator lights on the device are fine. Returning this within 2 hours of receiving it.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Instead to came with WD Red, camer with Seagate HDDs
customer_reviews.author: Túlio M.

customer_reviews.title: Ui is not friendly.. The response time is ...
customer_reviews.text: Ui is not friendly.. The response time is to long.
customer_reviews.author: Eran

customer_reviews.title: Synology updated this product within 1 week of shipping to ...
customer_reviews.text: Synology updated this product within 1 week of shipping to us. That was a little disappointing to pay retail and then have new product release to replace so soon.
customer_reviews.author: ftcpa

customer_reviews.title: Don't know how I feel about it.
customer_reviews.text: Don't know how I feel about this thing..every time I turn it on, my entire network goes crazy. Think I'm going to return it. I think it exposes vulerabilities or something.
customer_reviews.author: MalikM

product_meta.title: Synology DiskStation 2-Bay Diskless Private Cloud NAS (DS214se)
product_meta.description: Capacity:DisklessSynology DiskStation DS214se is a budget-friendly two-bay NAS device with the capability to host, share and protect data. Sharing the variety of packages in DSM Package Center, DS214se helps beginners explore the infinite possibilities of Synology NAS.
